name: !altbttv
message: $(urlfetch https://decapi.me/bttv/emotes/$(query))
description: Fetches the BTTV emotes of any specified Twitch channel

name: !altffz
message: $(urlfetch https://decapi.me/ffz/emotes/$(query))
description: Fetches the FFZ emotes of any specified Twitch channel

name: !badbot
message: swifCry I'm sorry! ($(count) people agree I'm annoying)

name: !bincount
message: $(eval ($(count) >>> 0).toString(2) )!
description: Increments a channel-wide binary counter

name: !bleep
message: $(eval let s='!@#$%^&*?'.split(''), q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); if(q.length != 0){ q=q.split(' '); for(w in q){ let l=q[w].length, x=Math.random(); if(x < 0.5){ q[w]=''; for(i=0;i<l;i++){ (s.length==0) && (s='!@#$%^&*?'.split('')); q[w]+=s.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*s.length),1) }}else{ continue} }; q.join(' ')}else{" "})
description: Replaces random words in the message with grawlixes

name: !bonk
message: Oww SwifBonk That's $(count) bonks.

name: !btb
message: A BTB (Bullet-Time Bounce) is a movement glitch in BotW. While in bullet-time, when Link shield-surfs onto an enemy as it enters a ragdoll state, he gets a 19x speed boost after the bullet-time is cancelled.
description: Explains a trick used in BotW speedrunning

name: !bttv
message: This channel's BTTV emotes: $(urlfetch https://decapi.me/bttv/emotes/$(channel))
description: Fetches the channel's BTTV emotes

name: !burn
message: Gottem Keepo
description: Useful after someone makes a mediocre insult

name: !caps
message: $(eval let q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); q.length > 0 ? q.toUpperCase() : ("Give me a sentence."))
description: Converts a message to all caps

name: !chance
message: There is a $(eval Math.ceil(Math.random() * 100) )% chance that $(eval decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"))!
description: Returns a random percent chance of a specified event occurring

name: !claim
message: $(eval $(count)%3===0 ? "@$(user), you claimed your one and only YEETr Buck. You get NOTHING! $(eval Math.floor($(count)/3)) chatters have been Jebaited" : "@$(user) No." )
description: From DJCarmichael's chat

name: !conch
message: ALL HAIL THE MAGIC CONCH! LULULULULULULU
description: A SpongeBob reference

name: !convbase
message: $(eval `$(1) in base $(2) is ${(+$(1) >>> 0).toString($(2)).toUpperCase()}.` )
description: Converts a number to the specified base

name: !count
message: $(count)!
description: Increments a channel-wide decimal counter

name: !counter
message: $(eval decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"))

name: !countget
message: $(eval let msg, count = $(count), q = "$(query)"; if ( q.toLowerCase().includes("set") ){ msg = `${count},fromgetter,set` } else { msg=`${count},fromgetter` }; msg )
description: Gets a channel-wide count without incrementing it; alias = __count__

name: !countset
message: __count__ -c=$(eval +$(query) )
description: Sets a channel-wide count; alias = !editcom

name: !dashless
message: Involving a host of in-game exploits and tricks, 1A Dashless is a speedrun category which aims to complete Celeste's first chapter without using any dashes and unlocks a secret golden strawberry.

name: !derp
message: $(eval let up = Math.random() > 0.2; let q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").split(''); q.map(function(char){if(char == ' '){return " "}; if(char == 'i' || char == 'I'){return "i"}; up = Math.random() > 0.2 ? !up : up; return up ? char.toUpperCase() : char.toLowerCase()}).join('') ) o_O
description: Intelligently randomizes the case of every letter in a message without too many repeats

name: !disable
message: $(query) -a=_disabled_command
description: Disables a command without deleting it; alias = !editcom

name: !dj
message: $(urlfetch https://icanhazdadjoke.com)
description: It's supposed to retrieve dad jokes, but I don't know DOM too well...

name: !echo
message: $(query)
description: Echoes a message and allows Nightbot to interpret the variables inside

name: !energy
message: $(user)'s energy level is $(1)/10 swifLove

name: !epoch
message: $(time GMT "x [milliseconds and counting!]")
description: Returns milliseconds since the UNIX epoch (1970-01-01)

name: !eval
message: $(eval $(query))

name: !factor
message: $(eval function fac(n) { let fs=[];while (n%2===0) {fs.push(2);n=n/2;} for (let i=3;i<=Math.sqrt(n);i++) { while(n%i===0) {fs.push(i);n=n/i} } if(n>2) {fs.push(n)}; return (fs).join(", "); } if(typeof($(eval $(query)))==="number"){"The factors of $(eval +$(query)) are: "+fac(+$(query))}else{"Hmm, looks like that's not a number."})
description: Returns the prime factorization of a given integer

name: !feedback
message: $(user) suggests I should $(query) swifSip Thank you, $(user) swifLove
description: Allows your moderators or chat to harrass you

name: !ffz
message: This channel's FFZ emotes: $(urlfetch https://decapi.me/ffz/emotes/$(channel))
description: Fetches the channel's FFZ emotes

name: !flip
message: $(eval ['Heads','Tails'][Math.floor(Math.random()*2)] )
description: Flips a coin

name: !formattime
message: $(time $(eval decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)")) )
description: Returns a time in a given timezone, assuming the query is a valid timezone. (See https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ for details.)

name: !heck
message: Heck you, $(eval a='insufferable,lukewarm,smelly,idiotic,lowly,brazen,churlish,incompetent,unholy,devilish,haughty,despicable,infernal,insolent,miserable,reprehensible,unapologetic,uncouth,irksome,foppish,ignorant'.split(',');n='clown,fiend,menace,boob,dunce,worm,cad,peasant,boor,butt,wart,buffoon,coward,oaf,fool,swindler,troglodyte,ruffian,curmudgeon'.split(',');r=(c)=>" "+c.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*c.length),1);`${decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)")}! You${r(a)+","+r(a)+r(n)}`)!
description: Lobs erudite curses at the specified target

name: !hexcount
message: $(eval ($(count) >>> 0).toString(16).toUpperCase() )!
description: Increments a channel-wide hexadecimal counter

name: !hitboxes
message: Do they exist? You tell me.

name: !hug
message: $(user) hugs $(query) swifLove
description: Allows a user to hug another user. Assumes a target is specified. I haven't spent any time designing something better.

name: !hundo
message: For the full 100% ruleset, go to https://www.speedrun.com/botw#100 and click the "View Rules" button.
description: A link to the BotW 100% speedrun ruleset

name: !irs
message: I tried claiming my new $(query) on my taxes, but I got back an {$(eval return)}. NotLikeThis Now my $(query) and I are being audited by the IRS.
description: A joke about every time I've gotten this error while working with JS

name: !isprime
message: $(eval function isPrime(num){if(typeof num===undefined){return "Hmm, looks like that's not a number."};if(num===2){return "$(1) is prime!";}else{if(num%2===0){return "$(1) is not prime."};}for(let i=3,s=Math.sqrt(num);i<=s;i+=2){if(num%i===0){return "$(1) is not prime.";}}return "$(1) is prime!"}; isPrime(+$(1)))
description: Determines whether or not an integer is prime. Note that Nightbot's execution timeout is 25ms. This command fails for numbers with more than roughly 20 digits

name: !js
message: Derek's written some commands in really poor JavaScript! Enter words for memes: !uwu / !uhm / !ye / !derp / !bleep / !just / !sobb / !heck / !ruok / !chance || Or numbers for math: !roll / !isprime / !factor / !math / !convbase || Others: !flip / !slots / !tz / !epoch / !formattime / !bincount / !hexcount /
description: A list of my favorite commands

name: !just
message: $(eval let q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); let up = Math.random() > 0.5; if(q.length != 0){ ("just "+q).split('').map(function(char){if(char == ' '){return " "}; if(char == 'i' || char == 'I'){return "i"}; up = Math.random() > 0.2 ? !up : up; return up ? char.toUpperCase() : char.toLowerCase()}).join('')+" 4Head"}else{" "} )
description: An alias for !derp, only with 4Head at the end

name: !math
message: (Note: This only accepts JavaScript as input.) $(eval +$(query) )

name: !n
message: $(eval let q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); q.length == 0 ? " " : q.replace(/n/g,'ñ').replace(/N/g,'Ñ'))
description: Converts n/N to ñ/Ñ

name: !ni
message: $(eval r=["You must cut down the mightiest tree in the forest...with...a herring!","We shall say 'Ni!' again to you if you do not appease us.","You must return here with a shrubbery or else you will never pass through this wood alive!","Firstly, you must find...another shrubbery!"];r[Math.floor(Math.random()*r.length)])
description: Returns a random line from the Knights Who Say 'Ni!' in Monty Python and the Holy Grail

name: !perch
message: Command: /data merge entity @e[type=ender_dragon,limit=1] {DragonPhase:2}
description: Forces the Dragon to perch

name: !ragdoll
message: Ragdoll is a state of physics where we lose control of Link. Obtaining a !skew necessary to shield-clip puts him in a glitched state where the next time he takes damage he enters ragdoll. Some launches fail because of this, so purposefully taking damage after a shield-clip clears this state and allows us to launch again.
description: Explains a technique used in BotW speedrunning

name: !random
message: $(eval Math.floor(Math.random()*9999999999))
description: Returns a random integer

name: !reverse
message: $(eval let q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").split(''); q.reverse().join('') )
description: Reverses the characters in a message

name: !roll
message: $(eval const roll = (lowerBound=1, upperBound=6) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (upperBound - lowerBound + 1)) + lowerBound; const l = $(2) ? +$(1) : 1, u = +$(2) || +$(1) || 6; roll(l, u) )
description: Rolls dice, accepting optional upper and lower bounds

name: !rotate
message: $(eval const q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); let r = []; let match = Array(95).fill().map((_, i) => String.fromCodePoint(32 + i)).join('').replace(/\)|\(|"/g, ""); const repl = ` ¡#$%⅋╻*+ʻ-./0⇂↊↋ߤϛ9ㄥ86:;>=<¿@∀ꓭϽᗡƎᖵ⅁HIᒋꓘ⅂ꟽNOԀꝹꓤSꓕ⋂ɅϺX⅄Z]\\[^‾,ɐqɔpǝɟƃɥᴉɾʞʅɯuodbɹsʇnʌʍxʎz}|{~`; const s = {"\x28": "\x29", "\x29": "\x28", "\"": ",," }; for(char in q.split('')){i = match.indexOf(q[char]); r.push(i != -1 ? repl[i] : q[char])}; r.reverse().join('').replace(/\)|\(|"/g, m => s[m]) )
description: Rotates a message 180 degrees, incorporating upside-down Unicode

name: !ruok
message: @$(user) $(eval let rd;let sw=[];let q="r u ok bc $(querystring)".toLowerCase();let r=decodeURIComponent(q).split('');for(let i=0;i<r.length;i++){rd=Math.random();if((rd<0.5)&&(/[a-z,]\s/.test(r[i]+r[i+1]) )){r[i]=r[i]+",".repeat(Math.floor(rd*10)+2)+" "; i++; rd=Math.random()} else if(/[a-z]{2}/.test(r[i]+r[i+1]) ){if(rd<0.3){r[i]=r[i]+r[i]} if(rd<0.1){r[i]=''}if(rd<0.1){r[i+1]=sw.shift()};sw.push(r[i]);rd=Math.random() }}r.join('')),,,,
description: Like !crytype, only less put together

name: !scw
message: Shrine Coordinate Warps are the latest major tricks in All Shrines speedruns. By activating a shrine elevator, storing the descent cutscene and moving it within the activation range of a different shrine, we can enter some shrines without doing their quests. This makes it possible to skip Vah Medoh, Vah Naboris, having to wait for a blood moon and more! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLii13EF5GET2m4gLeClzYTSkfVhlBYK7Y
description: Explains a trick used in BotW speedrunning

name: !setter
message: $(userid),$(query)
description: Related in some way to !counter; alias = !counter

name: !shrine
message: $(eval decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").length == 0 ? "empty" : " ")$(urlfetch https://botw-shrine-validator.glitch.me/?shrine=$(eval if(decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").length != 0){decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z]/g, "")}else{"none"}))
description: Links BotW speedrunners to CobChamp's website with information about a specified shrine; alias = _shrine

name: !skew
message: Skew is a stored angle gotten by shield-jumping onto a sloped surface. When you un-equip your shield during a shield jump, Link will tilt to this stored angle. The tilt can push Link through walls, which we use when doing shield clips.
description: Explains a technique used in BotW speedrunning

name: !slots
message: $(eval let e = []; ['ffz','bttv'].forEach(a => e.push(`$(urlfetch https://decapi.me/ffz/emotes/$(channel))`.split(' ').toString())); r=[]; for(i=0;i<3;i++){ x=Math.floor(Math.random()*e.length); r.push(e[x]);} r.join(' | ') + ((r[0]==r[1] && r[1]==r[2]) ? " You win!" : " "))
description: Rolls slots using the channel's FFZ and BTTV emotes.

name: !smol
message: $(eval const q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); const match = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890!-=+'.split('');const repl = 'ᵃᵇᶜᵈᵉᶠᵍʰᶦʲᵏˡᵐⁿᵒᵖᵠʳˢᵗᵘᵛʷˣʸᶻᴬᴮᶜᴰᴱᶠᴳᴴᴵᴶᴷᴸᴹᴺᴼᴾᵠᴿˢᵀᵁⱽᵂᵡʸᶻ¹²³⁴⁵⁶⁷⁸⁹⁰ᵎ⁻⁼⁺'.split('');let v = {};match.forEach((m,i) => {v[m] = repl[i];} );let z = q.split('').map((c) => v[c] || c).join(''); z.toString() )
description: Converts a message to small Unicode characters

name: !so
message: $(twitch $(touser) "Go check out {{displayName}} and their amazing channel over at {{url}} ! They were last streaming {{game}}. Be sure to give them a follow!") UwU

name: !crytype
message: $(eval let rd;let q="$(querystring)".toLowerCase();let r=decodeURIComponent(q).replace(/\./g,',').split('');for(let i=0;i<r.length;i++){rd=Math.random();if((rd<0.3)&&(/[a-z,]\s/.test(r[i]+r[i+1]) )){r[i]=r[i]+",".repeat(Math.floor(rd*10)+2)+" "; i++; rd=Math.random()} else if(/[a-z]{2}/.test(r[i]+r[i+1]) ){if(rd<0.1){r[i]=r[i]+r[i]} if(rd>0.95){[r[i],r[i+1]]=[r[i+1],r[i]];i++}if(rd<0.1){ r[i]=''}; rd=Math.random() }}r.join('')),,,, swifShy
description: Returns a cry-typed a message

name: !spikes
message: Spike hitboxes in Celeste don't cause damage when Madeline moves in a direction opposite them, even if she touches them. We abuse this mechanic to get away with some ballsy strats.

name: !strikethrough
message: $(eval let q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); q.length == 0 ? " " : q.split('') .map(char => char + '\u0336') .join('') )
description: Returns the message with every character given a strikethrough effect. This doesn't look the best in most browsers

name: !test
message: /me is online!

name: !time
message: $(twitch $(channel) "{{displayName}}")'s time is currently $(time <TIMEZONE> "dddd, D MMMM YYYY, HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSSSSS z")
description: Returns the streamer's current time. Be sure to set your timezone and preferred format. See https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ for details

name: !torrent
message: $(eval $(1) ? Math.round($(1) / 3) : "Enter a max HP to find the HP at which Torrent and Blaze apply.")
description: A tool for Pokémon speedrunners

name: !twitchstats
message: $(twitch $(1) "Stats for {{displayName}}: $(eval let q = "$(query)".split(/[,\s]+/); let r = []; q.slice(1).forEach(stat => r.push(`${stat}: {{${stat}}}`)); r.join("; ") )" )
description: Returns the stats for a Twitch account, given their username and a comma- or space-separated list of the parameters to retrieve, whose names must be properly formatted. Refer to https://docs.nightbot.tv/variables/twitch for details and the list of possible parameters

name: !tz
message: $(time $(1) "[The time in] z [(GMT] ZZ[) is] HH:mm:ss.")
description: Returns the time in a given timezone

name: !uhm
message: $(eval let match=/\s[a-z]/i; let rand; let q="$(querystring)"; let r=decodeURIComponent(q).split('');for(let i=-1; i < q.length; i++){rand=Math.random();if((match.test(r[i]+r[i+1]) || i==-1) && (rand < 0.15) ){r[i+1] = r[i+1]+"-"+r[i+1]; i++}; rand=Math.random(); if((rand<0.15) && (r[i]==' ')){r[i]='...'}else if((r[i]==' ') && (rand<0.3)){r[i]=", uhm, "}}; r.join(''))...
description: Returns a message in a voice that is very unsure of itself

name: !unicode
message: $(eval function getRandomInt(min, max) { min = Math.ceil(min); max = Math.floor(max); return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min) + min);} let r = Math.floor(Math.random()*1114111); if(r < 65536){ String.fromCharCode((r >>> 0).toString(16))}else{ String.fromCharCode((r >>> 0).toString(16),(getRandomInt(65536,1114111) >>> 0).toString(16))})
description: I think this is supposed to return a random Unicode character, but it doesn't work. Use !utf50 instead for now, I guess

name: !uptime
message: $(eval let prefix="", stats='$(twitch $(channel) "{{displayName}},{{uptimeLength}}")'.split(','); (stats[1].split('').length>18) ? (prefix="") : (prefix="has been streaming for"); `${prefix} ${stats[1].replace("channel",stats[0]).replace(/(?<=not) (?=live)/," currently ")}.`)
description: Returns the stream uptime if the channel is live, otherwise states that it is not

name: !urban
message: $(eval try{if(!decodeURIComponent(`$(querystring)`))throw 0;a=$(urlfetch json https://api.urbandictionary.com/v0/define?term=$(querystring));b=a.list[0];(b.definition+` | `+b.example).replace(/[\[\]]/g,``).replace(/[\n\r]/g,` `).slice(0,400);}catch(e){`No search result found!`;})
description: This is supposed to get the Urban Dictionary definition of a word, but it does not work

name: !utf50
message: $(eval let l = Math.floor(Math.random()*50); arr = []; for(i=0;i<l;i++){code = Math.floor(Math.random()*15000); arr.push(String.fromCharCode(code)); Math.random()<0.2 && arr.push(' ');} arr.join(''))
description: Returns 50 random (valid) Unicode characters. Sometimes it yields fewer because it's some characters coalesce

name: !uwu
message: $(eval let rd;let m=[/r|l/,/R|L/,/%20the%20/,/The/,/that/,/That/];let s=["w","W","%20teh%20","De","dat","Dat"];let q="$(querystring)";for(i in s){q=q.replace(RegExp(m[i],'g'),s[i])};let r=decodeURIComponent(q).split('');for(i=-1;i<=r.length;i++){rd=Math.random();if((r[i]=='u')&&(rd<0.2)){r[i]='uwu'}else if((r[i]=='t')&&(r[i+1]=='h')&&(rd<0.3)){r[i+1]=''};if((/\s[a-z]/i.test(r[i]+r[i+1])||i==-1)&&(rd<0.1)){r[i+1]=r[i+1].toLowerCase()+"-"+r[i+1]; i++}}r.join('')) UwU
description: Returns a message in the voice of the priest from The Princess Bride (UwU-speak)

name: !walls
message: Merely a suggestion ^___^

name: !weather
message: $(weather "$(query)")
description: Returns the weather in a given region

name: !whatis
message: $(urlfetch json https://api.wolframalpha.com/v2/query?input=$(querystring)&includepodid=Result&format=plaintext&output=json&appid=<YOUR WOLFRAMALPHA APP ID>)
description: Queries Wolfram|Alpha for answers to almost any question. For directions on getting the required API credentials, refer to https://community.nightdev.com/t/how-to-convert-currencies/17984/2 ; alias = _wolframalpha

name: !whistle
message: Whistle-sprinting is a useful technique which, by mashing run while whistling, allows one to
userlevel: Regain stamina lost by sprinting while maintaining 80% of full speed. The effect cuts out having to walk instead, and can even allow Link to scale steep slopes.
description: Everyone
column5: Explains a technique used in BotW speedrunning

name: !windbomb
message: Windbombs are a useful BotW physics exploit discovered by Satougashi wherein the explosion of one bomb propels a second bomb into Link's butt during Bullet Time. The impact launches him at high speeds, yielding itself a revolutionary mode of transport. Limcube has a helpful tutorial explaining it: https://youtu.be/Zye_41H94qg Everyone

name: !ye
message: $(eval q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").split(' ');r=q;m=[/\wer$/,/have/,/^yes/,/^no(?=\W)?$/,/did/,/^do$/,/you(?=\W)/,/you$/,/^my/,/your(?!e)/,/(there|that)(?=\W)?$/,/^are$/,/^the$/];s=["'er",'Hast','Yea','Nay','Didst','Doth','Thee','Thou','Mine','Thine','Yonder','art','Ye'];for(w in q){for(i in m){r[w]=r[w].replace(RegExp(m[i],'i'),s[i])};Math.random()<0.8&&(r[w]=r[w].replace(/(?<=\w),/,", alas,"))||(r[w]=r[w].replace(/(e)?(?=\W?$)/,"eth"))};r.join(' ').replace(/it( is|'s)/gi,"'tis"))
description: Converts a message to Shakespearean English

message: $(query)
description: A useful alias for !editcom; alias = !editcom

message: $(query)
description: A useful alias for !addcom; alias = !addcom

message: Yeah, what they said!

name: __count__
message: $(eval let msg, count = $(count), q = "$(query)".split(','), getterCount=q[0]; if ( q[2] == "set" && q[1] == "fromgetter" ){ msg = `Please run !countset with the number you're setting it to and add ${getterCount} to it.` } else if ( q[1] == "fromgetter" ){ msg = `!countget was run. The current count is ${ Math.abs(count - getterCount) }.`} else { msg = "I don't know what I'm meant to do." }; msg )

name: _count_command
message: $(query),$(count)

name: _disabled_command
message: $(eval " ") Moderator
userlevel: The command to which !disable aliases a command to be disabled. Its purpose is to do nothing

name: _shrine
message: $(eval const q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); if(/^empty/.test(q)){shrine=""; validName = ""}else{validName = q} if(validName != " false"){shrine = validName; `Learn about ${shrine == "" ? "all the shrines" : shrine + " Shrine"} here: https://learntheshrines.com/${shrine.toLowerCase().replace(/(^\s)|[^a-z\s]/g, "").replace(/\s/g, "-")}`}else{`Please use a valid shrine name. Don't worry about symbols or spaces!`})

name: _wolframalpha
message: $(eval s=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)");try{r=JSON.parse(s),r=r&&r.queryresult,r?(e=r.error)?"input parameter not present in query"==e.msg?"No query":e.msg||"Error":r.success?(p=r.pods)&&p[0]?(b=p[0].subpods)&&b[0]?(b[0].plaintext||"Query result has no text").replace(/(?<=[^ ])(?=\()|(?<=\))(?=[^ ])/g," ").substr(0,400):"Query result has no subpod":"Query has no result":"Query unsuccessful":"No response"}catch(a){`Failed to parse Wolfram|Alpha result: ${a.message}: ${s}`.substr(0,400)})
description: The command to which !whatis is aliased. This one, unline the other, does not contain credentials and can simply be copied and pasted

name: buy
description: alias = wanna

name: crap
message: $(eval const res = ['merde','caca','merda','paska','scheisse','dritt','дерьмо','똥','σκατά','मल','อึ','القرف','לְחַרְבֵּן','tae','मल','拉屎']; $(count)%5 == 0 ? "shit" : res[Math.floor(Math.random()*res.length)] )

name: e
message: OOOO O-oooooooooo AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U- JO-oooooooooooo AAE-O-A-A-U-U-A- RainbowPls E-eee-ee-eee MYAAA AAAAE-A-E-I-E-A-JO-ooo-oo-oo-oo catJAM EEEEO-A-AAA-AAAA pugPls

name: f
message: No F. Just how things go sometimes. Everyone

name: how
message: Good question... swifThink

name: how?
message: Like this: swifARTISTE

name: i
message: $(eval let q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").replace(/[\W]$/,"").split(' '); if(Math.random() < 0.014492753623188406 && q.length != 0){ const shuf = (arr) => { let i = 0, j = 0, temp = null; for (i = arr.length-1; i>0; i--) { j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1)); t = arr[i]; arr[i] = arr[j]; arr[j] = t} return arr };`I ${shuf(q).join(' ').trim()}.`}else{" "})
description: Returns a message with the order of words randomized every once in a while

name: i'm
message: $(eval let q="$(querystring)"; function spaces(str){return(((str||'').match(/%20/)||[]).length );} (((q.slice(0,1).toLowerCase() !== 'a ') || (q.slice(0,2).toLowerCase() !== 'an ')) && q.length<20 && spaces(q)<4 && Math.random()<0.4) ? "Hi "+decodeURIComponent(q)+", I'm Dad." : " " )
description: Tells a dad joke 20% of the time when someone begins a short sentence with "i'm"

name: if
message: $(eval let q = decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)").split(' '); (4 < q.length < 10 && Math.random() < 0.2) ? (`if( ${q.slice(0,3).join(" ")} ) { ${q.slice(3,q.length).join(" ")} }`) : " " ) Everyone
userlevel: Returns a message of between 4 and 10 words as an if statement 20% of the time

name: im
description: alias = i'm

name: just
message: $(eval let q=decodeURIComponent("$(querystring)"); let up = Math.random() > 0.5; if(Math.random() < 0.2 && q.length != 0){ ("just "+q).split('').map(function(char){if(char == ' '){return " "}; if(char == 'i' || char == 'I'){return "i"}; up = Math.random() > 0.2 ? !up : up; return up ? char.toUpperCase() : char.toLowerCase()}).join('')+" 4Head"}else{" "} )
description: Abets the user's demoralizating message 20% of the time by randomizing the case of each character like !derp

name: my
message: $(eval Math.random() < .2 ? decodeURIComponent("My cabbages 3A%28") : " ")
description: Avatar: The Last Airbender reference
